numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a difference between players of color and head coaches of color in all listed sports.
2. In all listed sports, the percentage of head coaches of color is between 13% and 41%.
3. In all listed sports, the percentage of head coaches of color does not reach 50%.
4. In football, players of color are a majority.
5. In basketball, players of color are a majority.
6. In soccer, players of color are a majority.
7. In baseball, players of color are not a majority.
8. I wonder why players of color in baseball are not a majority.
9. I wonder what caused this situation in baseball.
10. It is possible that the public presentation of baseball caused this situation.
11. This graph impacts our community positively.
12. The diversity among players can encourage other sports fans to play sports.
13. The diversity among players shows that people of color can have equal treatment in some sports.
14. This graph impacts our community negatively.
15. The lack of diversity among head coaches shows that people of color might not have the opportunity to lead.
16. The lack of diversity among head coaches could reinforce stereotypical job types in society.
17. The title is: Colored individuals are not getting equal opportunities on both sides of the major sports leagues, study says.
